sql.value: select t.DICT_KEY,t.DICT_NAME from SAG_DICT_DETAIL t where t.DICT_TYPE_CODE=:dictTypeCode order by t.SHOW_INDEX

select t.DICT_KEY, #[@blank(:dictName) t.DICT_NAME,] t.SEGMENT, t.COMMENTS from SAG_DICT_DETAIL t where t.DICT_TYPE_CODE=:dictTypeCode order by t.SHOW_INDEX #[ and 1=:type1 and ] #[ and 1=:type2 and ]
sql.count-sql: select count(1) from SAG_DICT_DETAIL t where t.DICT_TYPE_CODE=:dictTypeCode
